00013 AttributeDialog::Attribute::Attribute(const QString name,
00014                 const QString value): name_(name), value_(value) {
00015 }
00016 
00017 AttributeDialog::AttributeDialog(QWidget* parent): QDialog(parent),
00018 nameEdit_(0), valueEdit_(0) {
00019 
00020         // layout for the dialog
00021         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00022 
00023         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00024         layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00025 
00026         nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00027         nameEdit_->setToolTip(tr("Set the name for the attribute"));
00028         layout->addWidget(nameEdit_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00029 
00030         QLabel* valueLabel = new QLabel(tr("Value:"), this);
00031         layout->addWidget(valueLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00032 
00033         valueEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00034         valueEdit_->setToolTip(tr("Set the value for the attribute"));
00035         layout->addWidget(valueEdit_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00036 
00037         QDialogButtonBox* okCancelButtons = new QDialogButtonBox(
00038                         QDialogButtonBox::Ok | QDialogButtonBox::Cancel ,Qt::Horizontal,
00039                         this);
00040         connect(okCancelButtons, SIGNAL(accepted()),
00041                         this, SLOT(accept()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(okCancelButtons, SIGNAL(rejected()),
00043                         this, SLOT(reject()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044         layout->addWidget(okCancelButtons, 2, 0, 1, 2);
00045 }
00046 
00047 AttributeDialog::~AttributeDialog() {
00048 }
00049 
00050 AttributeDialog::Attribute* AttributeDialog::exec() {
00051 
00052         // execute at least once
00053         do {
00054                 // if user clicked "cancel"
00055                 if (!QDialog::exec()) {
00056                         return 0;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 // the dialog is executed again if the given info is not valid
00060         } while (nameEdit_->text().isEmpty() || valueEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00061 
00062         return new AttributeDialog::Attribute(nameEdit_->text(),
00063                         valueEdit_->text());
00064 }
